languageKey.label: 内置的地址数据库
你可以用它来建立TYPO3的地址列表。有预设Typo脚本代码，让您在线管理执行列表中的每个人自己的地址信息。此表还用于直接邮寄订阅表作为默认的通讯系统。
Built-in address database.

You may use it to build address lists in TYPO3. There are in fact default TypoScript code which allows you to implement a online administration of the address information by each person in the list himself. This table is also used by the Direct Mail system as the default subscription table for newsletters.
